values.description: Security group for Minecraft EC2 host
values.name: phantosio-minecraft-ec2

after.description: Security group for Minecraft EC2 host
after.name: phantosio-minecraft-ec2

values.description: Amazon Linux 2023 AMI 2023.8.20250915.0 x86_64 Minimal HVM kernel-6.1
values.name: al2023-ami-minimal-2023.8.20250915.0-kernel-6.1-x86_64

description.constant_value: Security group for Minecraft EC2 host

admin_cidr_allowlist.description: CIDR blocks allowed to access admin UI (rcon web) and SSH (if enabled).

backup_bucket_force_destroy.description: Allow Terraform to destroy the S3 backup bucket even if it contains objects (useful for dev).

data_volume_size_gb.description: Size of the dedicated EBS data volume mounted at /srv/minecraft

enable_ssh.description: Whether to open inbound SSH (22). Prefer SSM and keep this false.

minecraft_memory.description: Memory for the Paper server container

public_subnet_cidrs.description: Two public subnet CIDRs (in two AZs)

rcon_password.description: RCON password for the Minecraft server

rcon_web_port.description: RCON web admin port exposed on the instance

ssh_key_name.description: Optional EC2 key pair name for SSH. Leave null to use SSM only.
